# James Stewart - Product Manager

## About
This is the personal website and blog of James Stewart, a product manager with expertise in fintech, technology, and product development. The site contains personal essays, professional insights, and thoughts on life, work, and building products.

## Content Overview
- Personal homepage and professional profile
- Blog posts on product management, technology, and personal reflections
- Topics include: low/no-tech solutions, new product development, parenting, self-inquiry, cooking, and professional advice

## Key Pages
- Homepage: Personal and professional introduction
- Notes: Collection of blog posts and essays on various topics

## Personal Projects & Links
- Toastery Roastery: Coffee subscription service (https://toasteryroastery.com/)
- Birthday Bread: Goodwill project of sending bread to loved ones (http://birthdaybread.com)
- James Stewart Club: Tongue-in-cheek club for people who share the name James Stewart (http://james-stewart.club/)
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/james-r-stewart/
- GitHub: https://github.com/jamesrstew
- Website: https://jamesstew.art

## Usage Guidelines
This content represents personal views and experiences. Professional content is shared for educational purposes. Please respect the personal nature of family-related posts.
